text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Man Yartadda Minkum `An Dinihi Fasawfa Ya'ti Allahu Biqawmin Yuhibbuhum Wa Yuhibbunahu 'Adhillatin `Ala Al-Mu'uminina 'A`izzatin `Ala Al-Kafirina Yujahiduna Fi Sabili Allahi Wa La Yakhafuna Lawmata La'imin Dhalika FaÄ‘lu Allahi Yu'utihi Man Yasha'u Wa Allahu Wasi`un `Alimun
